def main():
	t=input()
	lt4=[]
	lt5=[]
	for i in range(t):
		lt1=[]
		n=input()
		for y1 in raw_input().split():
			lt1.append(int(y1))
		

		lt1.sort()
		#print lt1
		lt2=[]
		lt3=[]
		for i1 in range(n):
			count=1
			#flag=0
			x=lt1[i1]
			for j1 in range(i1+1,n):
				if(x==lt1[j1] and lt1[j1]>=0):
					count=count+1
					lt1[j1]=-1
			#		flag=1
				
			#if(flag==1):
			lt2.append(x)
			lt3.append(count)

		#print lt2
		#print lt3
		numb=lt2[0]
		max_count=lt3[0]

		for i1 in range(1,n):
			if(lt2[i1]>=0):
				if(lt3[i1]>max_count):
					max_count=lt3[i1]
					numb=lt2[i1]
		lt4.append(numb)
		lt5.append(max_count)

	for i in range(t):
		print lt4[i],lt5[i]
	#print numb,max_count








if __name__ == '__main__':
	main()
